title: Bing Auto Search for Microsoft Rewards
description: Browser-based Bing auto search bot to earn Microsoft Rewards points.
header: Bing Auto Search for Microsoft Rewards
disclaimer: This page is not affiliated with Microsoft, Rewards, Bing or Edge.
trademark: Microsoft, Rewards, Bing and Edge are registered trademarks of Microsoft Corporation in the United States of America and elsewhere.
nonProfit: This is a non-profit project and is licensed under open source terms on GitHub.
pointsBreakDesc: Under the new Microsoft Rewards rules, for some restricted accounts, points will only be awarded for 3 searches every 15 minutes (If this is your case, use the 5 minute interval.).
termsWarning: Using automation tools is against the Microsoft Rewards terms of use. Your account may be restricted, suspended and/or banned, use this tool at your own risk.
step1: Sign in to Bing with your Microsoft Rewards account and return to this page.
step2: Start a new auto search by clicking the "Start Auto Search" button, the progress counter will be showned.
step3: To perform mobile searches, use your smartphone or emulate a mobile browser through the developer tools (F12) on the PC.
multitabNote: When enabled, it's necessary to allow opening of multiple tabs/pop-ups in your browser.
